languages.text: "И я подумала... Я решила, что могу тебе доверять. Это очень опасно — доверять кому-то себя. Но почему-то мне кажется, что ты не воспользуешься моей уязвимостью". {n}Закрыв глаза, девушка произносит фразу на неизвестном вам языке, и на губах у нее возникает светлая улыбка.{/n}

"And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И я подумала... Я решила, что могу тебе доверять. Это очень опасно — доверять кому-то себя. Но почему-то мне кажется, что ты не воспользуешься моей уязвимостью". {n}Закрыв глаза, девушка произносит фразу на неизвестном вам языке, и на губах у нее возникает светлая улыбка.{/n}

But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

"And so I've thought about it... I've decided that I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

"And so I've thought about it... I've decided that I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

languages.text: “我仔细思考过这些事情……我决定相信你。将自己完全托付给另一个人是件非常危险的事情，但我明白，你绝不会利用我的弱点。”{n}她闭上双眼，用你听不懂的语言说了些什么，嘴角露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我仔细思考过这些事情……我决定相信你。将自己完全托付给另一个人是件非常危险的事情，但我明白，你绝不会利用我的弱点。”{n}她闭上双眼，用你听不懂的语言说了些什么，嘴角露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: 「そして、あたしはそのことを考えた…あんたを信じていいと決めたんだ。他人を信頼するのはとても危険なことだよ。でもどういうわけか、あんたはあたしの弱みにつけ込んだりしないとわかったんだ」{n}彼女は目を閉じ、あなたにはわからない言葉で何かを言い、唇に輝くような笑みを浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして、あたしはそのことを考えた…あんたを信じていいと決めたんだ。他人を信頼するのはとても危険なことだよ。でもどういうわけか、あんたはあたしの弱みにつけ込んだりしないとわかったんだ」{n}彼女は目を閉じ、あなたにはわからない言葉で何かを言い、唇に輝くような笑みを浮かべる。{/n}

languages.text: «Por eso lo he estado pensando y... he decidido que puedo confiar en usted. Es muy peligroso confiar la propia vida a otra persona, pero de alguna manera sé que no abusará de mi vulnerabilidad». {n}Cerrando los ojos, dice algo en un idioma que no entiendes y una sonrisa radiante aflora en sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por eso lo he estado pensando y... he decidido que puedo confiar en usted. Es muy peligroso confiar la propia vida a otra persona, pero de alguna manera sé que no abusará de mi vulnerabilidad». {n}Cerrando los ojos, dice algo en un idioma que no entiendes y una sonrisa radiante aflora en sus labios.{/n}

languages.text: « Alors j'ai beaucoup réfléchi... et j'ai décidé que je pouvais vous faire confiance. C'est très dangereux d'accorder sa confiance totale à quelqu'un, mais au fond de moi, je sais que vous ne profiterez pas de ma vulnérabilité. » {n}Elle ferme les yeux et prononce quelques mots dans une langue que vous ne comprenez pas, puis ses lèvres forment un sourire radieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors j'ai beaucoup réfléchi... et j'ai décidé que je pouvais vous faire confiance. C'est très dangereux d'accorder sa confiance totale à quelqu'un, mais au fond de moi, je sais que vous ne profiterez pas de ma vulnérabilité. » {n}Elle ferme les yeux et prononce quelques mots dans une langue que vous ne comprenez pas, puis ses lèvres forment un sourire radieux.{/n}

languages.text: "Und deshalb habe ich nachgedacht ... Und bin zu dem Entschluss gekommen, dass ich Euch vertraue. Es ist sehr gefährlich, sich einer anderen Person anzuvertrauen. Aber irgendwie weiß ich, dass Ihr meine Verletzlichkeit nicht ausnutzt." {n}Sie schließt die Augen und sagt etwas in einer Sprache, die du nicht verstehst. Dann erscheint ein strahlendes Lächeln auf ihren Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

Aber irgendwie weiß ich, dass Ihr meine Verletzlichkeit nicht ausnutzt." {n}Sie schließt die Augen und sagt etwas in einer Sprache, die du nicht verstehst. Dann erscheint ein strahlendes Lächeln auf ihren Lippen.{/n}

languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided that I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de bunun üzerine düşündüm ve... Sana güvendiğime karar verdim. Kendin konusunda başka bir insana güvenmek çok tehlikelidir. Fakat bir şekilde biliyorum ki sen, benim savunmasızlığımdan istifade etmeyeceksin." {n}Gözlerini kapayıp anlamadığın bir dilde bir şeyler söylüyor, ardından dudaklarına ışıl ışıl bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so I've thought about it... I've decided I can trust you. It's very dangerous, trusting another person with yourself. But somehow, I know you won't take advantage of my vulnerability." {n}Closing her eyes, she says something in a language you do not understand and a radiant smile comes to her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ve ben de bunun üzerine düşündüm ve... Sana güvendiğime karar verdim. Kendin konusunda başka bir insana güvenmek çok tehlikelidir. Ama bir şekilde biliyorum ki sen benim savunmasızlığımdan istifade etmeyeceksin." {n}Gözlerini kapıyor ve anlamadığın bir dilde bir şeyler söylüyor, ardından dudaklarına ışıl ışıl bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
